front.title: Generalized Multi-Protocol Label Switching (GMPLS) Signaling Extensions for G.709 Amendment3 Optical Transport Networks Control

abstract.t: This document updates the "draft-ke-ccamp-gmpls-odu0-00.txt". It describes the extensions of GMPLS signaling to control Optical Transport Networks (OTN) including ODU0, ODU1, ODU2, ODU2e, ODU3, ODU3e1, ODU3e2, ODU4 and ODUflex. It also describe the interworking between pre-G.709 and G.709 Amendment3.
